docs.text: Setup Requirements 2–4 webcams (1080p/60+ recommended) Quest 3 (or any OpenXR headset) Windows/Linux PC (RTX 2070 Super class OK) Steps Mount cameras per docs/specs/room_12x12_layout.png . Install bridge app (coming soon in software/apps/ ). Enable Git LFS before adding media/models.
